parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch>
  <entity name="contact">
    <attribute name="contactid" />
    <link-entity name="pfc_query_contact" from="contactid" to="contactid" intersect="true">
      <filter>
        <condition attribute="pfc_queryid" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Obtener_una_fila_por_id_(Consultes)')?['body/pfc_queryid']}" />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Bon dia,

Ja podeu veure la resposta a la vostra consulta @{outputs('Obtener_una_fila_por_id_(Consultes)')?['body/pfc_name']}.


Enllaç a la resposta

    <attribute name="contactid" />
    <link-entity name="pfc_contact_pfc_query_dgt" from="contactid" to="contactid" intersect="true">
      <filter>
        <condition attribute="pfc_query_dgtid" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Obtener_una_fila_por_id_3_(consulta_dgt)')?['body/pfc_query_dgtid']}" />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

    <link-entity name="pfc_tax_transcendence_operation_contact" from="contactid" to="contactid" intersect="true">

      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
<entity name="systemuser">
<link-entity name="teammembership" from="systemuserid" to="systemuserid">
<link-entity name="team" from="teamid" to="teamid" alias="ac">
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="teamid" operator="eq" value="@{items('Aplicar_a_cada_Equipo')?['teamid']}"/>
</filter>
</link-entity>
</link-entity>
</entity>
</fetch>
